availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of Charles Murphey and Lettie Murphey. Married to Martha Ann Pritchett Murphey in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on December 1, 1852. Father of John W. Murphey and Charles N. Murphey. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 163A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Precinct 2, p. 35A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, August 1863, p. 140.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages, p. 2.
"Enos Murphey (1829-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial #188549384, accessed October 12, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/188549384.
